Mass Gymnastic Display in Yemen Helped by DPRK
articles.content:
Mass Gymnastic Display in Yemen Helped by DPRK 
   Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A mass gymnastic display created with the cooperation of the DPRK was held in Hodeida, Yemen, on May 22 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the unification of Yemen.
 It was appreciated by Yemeni President Ali Abdullah Saleh, high-ranking officials of the government and the General People's Congress, various delegations of Arab countries and a mass gymnastic delegation of the DPRK.    
 The president met the members of the DPRK delegation to express thanks.

Message of Sympathy to Fidel Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Fidel Castro Ruz 
   Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on May 28 sent a message of sympathy to Cuban President of the Council of Ministers Fidel Castro Ruz, who is first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and president of the Cuban Council of State, as regards the recent downpour that hit Havana, causing human and material losses.
 In the message Kim expressed deep sympathy with the Cuban president and, through him, with the Cuban government and people, hoping that the Cuban government would offset the effects of the recent damage and bring the citizens' life to normal as soon as possible.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President 
   Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on May 28 sent a message of sympathy to Indonesian President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono as regards the big human and material losses caused by a strong earthquake that hit the Jogjakarta area of Indonesia.
 In the message Kim expressed the belief that the Indonesian president and government would heal the earthquake damage at an early date and stabilize the people's life in the affected region.
